name: The Phantom Of Dicey Dungeon
description:
The Phantom Of Dicey Dungeon

Made by Threshold Games for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Included also is a pdf version of the story if you want to play the old fashioned way.

Click on the arrows to turn the pages. Click on the die to roll it.

Thanks for playing!

Works best in full screen.

Music by Eric matyas

www.soundimage.org
